headline: Avoiding Keurig Dr Pepper Based On Quantitative Business Valuation
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper struggles with weak financials, high expenses, and poor cash flow. See why KDP stock may not be ideal for long-term investors.

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper Unveils First-Ever State of Beverages Report
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper (NASDAQ: KDP) today released its State of Beverages 2025 Trend Report, an inaugural, insight-rich report exploring the functional, emotional and generational dynamics driving America's beverage choices.

headline: How Keurig Dr Pepper CEO Tim Cofer secured one of the biggest coups of his career, a $1.65 billion deal for an energy drink giant
summary: Cofer had his eye on Ghost—but had to persuade cofounder Dan Lourenco to sell.
